name: motor-drive
description: Whenever an electric-type move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.  This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. thunder wave.
short_description: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.
